name: OrbJectile
description:
Turn down the lights, Light some candles, and put on some of your favorite spacey music. It's time to launch space orbs, on foreign planets, at blocks. Master your skills to get the highest score on each planet (currently only one planet in v1.0) Supporting the game may bring the birth of more planets. Each new planet will have unique environments, which will affect the way you play.

-Take out the small gold block to advance to the next level

-Your level score adds to your overal score ( minus 1 pt if you miss after 3 tries)

-Your highscore is recorded once you complete the last level of the planet (Quitting or leaving the game will reset your score)
